channel.title: Spying on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Spying on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: US Investment in Spyware Is Skyrocketing
item.description: A new report warns that the number of US investors in powerful commercial spyware rose sharply in 2024 and names new countries linked to the dangerous technology.
